list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I hope we're doing the right thing
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi hy vọng chúng ta đang làm điều đúng đắn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: true or correct as a fact.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I'm not sure I know the right answer
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi không chắc tôi biết câu trả lời đúng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: in a satisfactory, sound, or normal state or condition.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: xúc xích đó không có mùi đúng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: on, toward, or relating to the side of a human body or of a thing that is to the east when the person or thing is facing north.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: are you politically right, left, or center?
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bạn có chính trị đúng, trái, hoặc trung tâm?

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: to the furthest or most complete extent or degree (used for emphasis).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the car spun right off the track
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Xe quay ngay khỏi đường đua

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: on or to the right side.
that which is morally correct, just, or honorable.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she doesn't understand the difference between right and wrong
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cô ấy không hiểu sự khác biệt giữa đúng và sai

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a moral or legal entitlement to have or obtain something or to act in a certain way.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she had every right to be angry
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cô ấy có quyền tức giận

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the right-hand part, side, or direction.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: take the first turning on the right
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Thực hiện rẽ đầu tiên bên phải

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a group or party favoring conservative or reactionary views.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the Right got in at the election
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: quyền được đưa vào cuộc bầu cử

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: restore to a normal or upright position.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi đã có xu hướng bị lật úp

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: used to indicate one's agreement or to acknowledge a statement or order.
